content:
RenderingBias Enum

Definition

Indicates whether the system renders an effect with emphasis on speed or quality.

In this Article

public enum RenderingBias
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
RenderingBias

Examples

Effect BlurEffect DropShadowEffect

Fields

Performance

The rendering system emphasizes performance.
Quality

The rendering system emphasizes quality.
